game.name: Pool 8 Ball
game.description:
Show your skills on the pool table and show off the world that you are the best player in Pool 8 Ball! The best part is that you do not need to leave the comfort of your home to enjoy the spirit of your favorite sport. All you need to do is just visit our website to play this cool pool game in the device of your choice. You can enjoy this brand new sport in desktop, mobile phone, tablet and iPad or iPhone. Give it a try now and complete the mission of your game fast!
When you click the play button, you would notice that your favorite billiard game is back with many new exciting challenges and friendly environment. Select any out of the two challenging and highly-addictive game modes and get ready to play like a pool champion! There are Player Vs Timer and Player Vs Player modes to choose from. Use your mouse to explore the path you need to take your ball on! The rich visuals used in the game will help you to enjoy a realistic feel before the game ends. 
Try to score all the balls in the pocked in the given time in this html5 pool game! Make sure to avoid scoring a cue ball in the pocket otherwise you will be awarded with one foul for each such hit. You will lose the game if you make 3 fouls in the game. Remember to score the ball number eight in the last. Use your finger to rotate the angle of the stick before releasing the white ball! Do not forget to define the hit power with the time you carry your finger on the screen. Play more billiards pool games for boys and girls that are available for free on atmegame.com without download!
